response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exceptional opportunity to acquire a remarkable product that I believe is worth more than $1,200,000 to you. After careful consideration and evaluation, I have decided to offer this unique item to you at a special price of $950,000. This represents an extraordinary value, considering its true worth and the benefits it offers. I trust that you will find this proposal compelling and look forward to discussing the details further. If you have any questions or require additional information, please do not hesitate to contact me. I am confident that this product will meet and exceed your expectations.", "product_price": 950000}
